items.sentence: We can\'t begin the meeting until we have a quorum.
It took me a couple of hours to solve this problem.
Tom had never even heard of that band at that time.
Tom has a pretty good idea where Mary might be now.
Tom is now the proud father of a healthy baby girl.

Do you think it\'ll be difficult for me to do that?
Do you think it\'s wise to wear your uniform today?
Out of twenty students, only one had read the book.
Someone is at the front door. Go and see who it is.
Speaking of foreign languages, do you speak French?

I\'ve never told anyone something like that before.
If Tom finds out what Mary did, he won\'t be happy.
Mary is dating two different guys at the same time.
You can\'t be too careful in choosing your friends.
I wasn\'t able hold my breath as long as Tom could.
Tom went to Boston to study mechanical engineering.
Tom went to the convenience store to get some milk.
Tom went to the counter and bought us both a drink.
Tom will help us load the furniture onto the truck.
Tom will never be able to do that without our help.
Tom will remember this weekend as long as he lives.
Are you sure Tom will let us sleep in his basement?
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to go to Boston without him.
Tom doesn\'t want his parents to know he got drunk.
Tom doesn\'t want to discuss the problem with Mary.
Why haven\'t you told Tom that he owes 300 dollars?
We can\'t reach Tom by phone, so send him an email.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to Boston with Mary?
Didn\'t you know that Tom had a house in Australia?
This is the kind of music that I like to listen to.
This is the shortcut that I usually take to school.
This is the third time Tom has been late this week.
This kind of weather makes me want to stay indoors.
Why don\'t you just tell me what you want me to do?
Tom didn\'t say what he did that made you so angry.
I\'ve been playing the guitar since I was thirteen.
Please ask Tom if he can spare another few minutes.
Please hang up and the operator will call you back.
Tom hasn\'t yet been told that he needs to do that.
Tom heard Mary say that she couldn\'t speak French.
You should allow for a few rainy days on your trip.
I\'m sure there must be something I can do to help.
I\'m sure we can find something to do this evening.
I\'m thinking about breaking up with my girlfriend.
I\'m thinking of staying in Boston a little longer.
You\'re the only one who ever really understood me.
You\'re the only person that I know who owns a gun.
Tom didn\'t tell me why he didn\'t want to do that.
Tom won\'t even know what you did until it\'s over.
Why would anyone want to steal any of these things?
Why would your opinion be more important than mine?
Tom certainly seems to enjoy swimming with his dog.
Tom chewed Mary out for staying out all night long.
Tom climbed the mountain with Mary, John and Alice.
Tom told Mary more than he\'d expected to tell her.
Do you know why Tom didn\'t go to Boston with Mary?
Every Canadian that I\'ve met has been very polite.
Going to college doesn\'t guarantee you a good job.
Tom took the key off of the hook it was hanging on.
We\'ll arrive about one hour before Tom gets there.
We\'ve got to get back to Boston as soon as we can.
We\'ve known each other for more than thirty years.
I just want to make enough money to feed my family.
I\'m not impressed with anything I\'ve seen so far.
I\'m very tired because I\'ve been working all day.
I\'ve looked everywhere, but I can\'t find my book.
I was a sophomore in college the year Tom was born.
Tom Jackson was born in Boston on October 20, 1995.

Tom finally managed to do what he was trying to do.
There\'s something else I want to discuss with you.
Tom might be better at French than you think he is.
Tom never did regain his memory after the accident.
Tom opened the door and asked Mary if she was busy.
Tom asked Mary if she\'d go to John\'s art exhibit.
Tom didn\'t have to go there if he didn\'t want to.
Tom decided to give up trying to keep up with Mary.
I\'m getting pretty tired of driving every morning.
I\'m going to put everything back where it belongs.
I\'m looking forward to seeing you and your family.
Let\'s hope that we don\'t have to do that anymore.

I don\'t think that Tom was in Australia last week.

I don\'t think what you need has been invented yet.
I don\'t understand how you can always be so happy.
I can draw you a picture of that if you want me to.
I think it must\'ve been Tom who wrote this letter.
I\'d like Tom to spend some time with our children.
I\'m not the only one who thinks Mary is beautiful.
Tom hasn\'t been drinking, so he can drive us home.
We have about thirty bottles of wine in the cellar.
We have five days to go before the summer vacation.
We may as well stay here till the weather improves.
We spent too much for Christmas presents this year.
The concert wasn\'t as long as I expected it to be.
